c74object.name: hoa.irconverter~
c74object.digest: An impulse response converter for ambisonics processing.
c74object.description:
hoa.irconverter~
creates the circular harmonic dependant signals of a discrete circular impulse response for ambisonics processing. It facilitates the convertion for the use of hoa.convolve~ and allows you to change the incidence angles of the discrete impulse response. The impulse response could be used with the hoa.convolve~ object to create reverberation in the circular harmonics domain. The first argument is the order and second argument is the number of loudspeakers. The attributes set the buffer~ objects, the channels and the angles of the impulse response part (look at the help patch for further informations).

metadatalist.metadata: hoa.library by Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

attribute.name: buffers
attribute.digest: Load the different part of the discrete impulse reponse in buffer~ objects.
attribute.description: Load the different part of the discrete impulse reponse in buffer~ objects. hoa.irconverter~ share the same syntax as the polybuffer~ object and auto-complete the name with the "all" message.

attribute.name: channels
attribute.digest: Bind all the first buffer~ objects channels to the impulse response channels.
attribute.description: Bind all the first buffer~ objects channels to the impulse response channels. hoa.irconverter~ accepts the pre-message "all".

attribute.name: angles
attribute.digest: Set the angles of each impulse response part.
attribute.description: Set the angles of each impulse response part. "default" symbol sets the angles to the default position.
